overview: Collection of six short films from Nova. "Pocket Pool" — When Jeremy invites Toby over for a game of pool, he has other indoor sports in mind as well. "Kissin' Cousins" — Tad comes up from the country to visit his cousin Jerry and soon the two boys are busily checking out the changes in each other. "Shootin' Baskets" — Buddy's job as cleanup boy for the high-school basket ball team gets him into interesting and rewarding situations. "Cleanin' Up" — Gerry spots hunky T.J. cleaning up the shop. T.J. responds to Gerry's flirting with a hard thick cock. "Big Payoff" — Joel meets the hot looking paperboy making his collections and invites him in for a relaxing swim. "An Anatomy Lesson" — Scott drags Jody back to the classroom to settle an argument about which muscle is which.
title: Kyd Stuf
